If you have one meal in Barcelona, this should be it.  We had our first meal here on a week long trip and everything else was held to this impossibly high standard. It is filled with locals which is a good sign and had an unassuming but pleasant air.   The food was incredible. Tried the grilled octopus and it was mind-blowingly amazing.  The bacalao salad was so fresh tasting - a hint of salt and just right proportion of tomato and oil. The tomato bread was delicious - crispy and savory in all the right places.  Skip 7 Portes and go here.
